rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0001
rows.name:
There's a really great view of the
whole village from here, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0002
rows.name: Indeed! It's quite the vista.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0003
rows.name: Such a fine village it is, too...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0004
rows.name:
Certainly no one is awash with luxury
down there. But still, the people are
remarkably happy.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0005
rows.name:
Even when life is hard, they keep
smiling, keep looking forward.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0006
rows.name:
I think of it as the continuation of
Vandham-san's spirit. He may be gone, but
his good deeds outlive him.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0007
rows.name:
Yes, it's a fine thought, knowing
the man who built and protected
this village was once my Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0008
rows.name: What should I say...?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0009
rows.name: Do you want to hear about Vandham-san?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0010
rows.name: Do you wish you could stay here?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0101
rows.name:
Well... It seems a tad rude to
go on about my old Driver in
front of my current one.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0102
rows.name:
But I've heard he was quite
the remarkable man.
Naturally, I'm curious.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0103
rows.name: He was one of the good guys, all right.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0104
rows.name:
He had big muscles, a big voice,
and an even bigger heart.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0105
rows.name:
It was Vandham who taught me
the basics of being a Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0106
rows.name: More than that, in fact...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0107
rows.name:
He taught me all about Blades, how to
fight, the way of the world...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0108
rows.name:
I didn't know him for long, but he
taught me the most important things I
know.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0109
rows.name: Is that right...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0110
rows.name:
He was the kind of solid, powerful
and dashing sort that is irresistible
to the opposite sex, I'll wager.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0111
rows.name:
Erm, I'm not sure if he was that
much of a hit with the ladies.
But he was a great guy, that's for sure.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0112
rows.name:
Hmmm. I feel the loss of my memories
of him very keenly.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0113
rows.name: Well, don't worry, Suzaku.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0114
rows.name: Like I said before.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0115
rows.name:
The people of this village are carrying
on what he started. And so are we.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0116
rows.name:
I hope I can become as good as him
some day. I may still have a way to go...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0117
rows.name:
But just you stick with me, Suzaku,
and one day, you'll see!

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0118
rows.name: I don't doubt it.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0119
rows.name:
I promise to hold you to the same high
standards, Rex.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0201
rows.name: I wouldn't say that.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0202
rows.name:
After all, it's not like I have any
memories of my time in this village.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0203
rows.name:
But I believe something lives on here.
Something of Vandham, and of myself.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0204
rows.name:
When I think about it, I can't help
but get a tad sentimental.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0205
rows.name: Yeah, I know what you mean.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0206
rows.name:
It's like the village is full of memories...
Memories of you, memories of
Vandham-san.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0207
rows.name:
I wonder how he and I used to spend
our days...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0208
rows.name:
I think...you probably both lived
pretty normal lives, really.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0209
rows.name: Normal?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0210
rows.name:
That's right. Vandham was the
everyday sort, you know?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0211
rows.name:
I mean, he'd get up in the morning, see
to the kids, then he'd just eat a big
sausage sandwich.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0212
rows.name:
Evenings, he'd drink a beer and chat
about what he was up to. Then he'd
just get a bit sleepy, and go to bed.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0213
rows.name:
I think that's what he was trying to
build here. A place where people
could just...live normal lives.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0214
rows.name:
I think that's what both of you
were always fighting for.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0215
rows.name: Fighting for a normal life...?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0216
rows.name:
Then perhaps even now, that
normal life is what the people
of this village hold most dear.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0217
rows.name:
Tell me, Rex... Would you say
Vandham was a kind person?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0218
rows.name: Kind, huh...?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0219
rows.name:
I mean, he was straight up with
everyone. Maybe even blunt sometimes.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0220
rows.name: But he was a real gentle giant.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0221
rows.name:
He'd probably get mad at me
for saying it, but I think he was
a lot like a father.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0222
rows.name:
He's someone that I looked up to.
Someone I'd like to be like someday.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0223
rows.name:
I can see you hold him in great
regard, Rex. I only wish I could
have met him myself.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0224
rows.name:
He did everything he could to protect
us. I bet he's still watching over us
from somewhere, even now...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0225
rows.name:
Well. In that case, I'd better make
sure he always sees me at my best!

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0226
rows.name:
Yeah... I reckon if we don't live
up to his expectations, we'll be
in for a right rollicking someday!
